resources.string: The network connection on your device has some issues. Please check your settings and try again.
The server is temporarily out of service. Usually it will recover within 24 hours. Please wait with patience.
Data directory is not found on server. Please make sure the dir ID is correct.
Data file is not found on server. Please contact check files through 4shared Web console.
Cannot load data from server due to unknown error. Please try again.
